website_summaries.verdict: A versatile LIFX bulb that is easy to set up. Provides impressive light in an almost countless number of shades.The best value from the company for all it has to offer.
pros: In addition to millions of colors, it emits whites that range from warm to cool
Produces bright light similar to incandescent bulbs
The best value from LIFX considering features and reliability
cons: Some reported connectivity issues when trying to pair more than one bulb
Has a tendency to drop connection, but is a bit more reliable than other mid-priced options

customer_reviews.title: Connecting to Wifi is a pain
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great, the app is easy to use. My problem with this bulb is setup. Rarely, if ever, has the bulb connected on the first try. I’ve had this bulb now for nearly four years and am familiar with the setup procedure, so that’s not the problem. It just always seems to take three or four tries before it connects. And each time I have to go back to the lamp and turn it off and on five times, then go through the whole procedure to connect it to my Wifi. Pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: WoodsWalker

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to the future of lighting.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are fantastic. They are easily pairable with your wi-fi, easily controllable by your phone, and look great. The app is a growing work in progress that the Lifx team is constantly updating, so any issues with it are quickly fixed by the very attentive Lifx team. Sometimes, bulbs drop in and out of connection to the app, but it's not a make or break. I'd put these bulbs in every socket in my house if the price were a bit lower, which I'm sure will happen with time. I've recommended them to friends, who have now bought seven, four, and three respectively. We definitely dig 'em.
customer_reviews.author: C. CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb!
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it! Early conversations around the light bulb went something like this: "honey can you turn out the light?" "I can't, I don't know where my phone is." -or- "I can't the router went down." But now we're pretty set! The bulb can actually be turned off/on easily using the regular switches, even if the phone isn't around. I didn't realize this. I highly recommend using the "widgets" available (at least for android) so that you can easily press a "scene" button on your phone without having to navigate to the app. I have two, one for "relaxed" and one for "bright." PS. Take a poll of the room before you surprise people with the strobe mode!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: All three keep disconnecting from wifi
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. Despite following instructions carefully these bulbs (I bought 3) keep variably disconnecting from wifi (wifi signal itself has been stable) rendering them stuck and uncontrollable which is a problem when they're in my kids rooms and they are sleeping. Returning these. Clearly have software bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Update: No longer working.
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb. Lots of colors. Integrates well with Smartthings. Using this with the stand-alone app and integrating with multiple smartthings smartapps. Update: 3/14/16 -Bulb no longer connects to Wifi. Flickers while on every few seconds (read it is due to dropping of wifi and reconnecting). I have updated to the latest firmware, reset the bulb many times, but always get "lifx failed to onboard you're bulb" every time I try to re-add it. Bulb shows up in the app and then goes away. It is no longer usable. Haven't even owned the bulb for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: TLarson

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights but unreliable software
customer_reviews.text: Provides nice colors and strong light for a wi-fi globe (we have them mounted in the rafters as effect lighting), but strobe setting is useless due to inconvenience and music pulse functionality doesn't work with streaming services. Biggest problem is that they occasionally disappear from the network meaning you have to set them up all over again and rename and regroup. Have not been able to reliably set them up as a home network and had one that continually misbehaves whereas the second one is pretty solid. I would have returned them if they were not so difficult to access to pull back out again.
customer_reviews.author: MickSD77

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Was working wonderfully until I updated my wireless router. It doesn't connect to any of my mobile devices or tablets. It's a glorified super expensive bulb that can't change color or connect to my Echo dot. It was great when it worked, but I've been trying to trouble shoot this bulb for about 2 months and have pretty much given up. Hard resets don't work, I've tried other light sockets to no avail. Would it be mean to re-gift this as a Christmas gift? At this point I'm not sure what to do with it. The Android app is useless and I've never received any meaningful feedback from Lifx.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha NinjaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Support team is awesome and still allowed me to return the bulb long ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 3 bulbs I purchased flashes uncontrollably. After resetting the bulb many times, the issue is still occurring. Support team is awesome and still allowed me to return the bulb long after I purchased. Other than that, I'm amazed at how many colors the bulb can be configured to.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great initially...
customer_reviews.text: but now they don't stay connected. I have had this issue with the gen 2&3 color bulbs and some of the white ones. I have about 9 or so of these bulbs and when i first purchased them they were great. In August the app ran a firmware update and now they will not stay connected to the wi-fi. The gen 3 color bulb has since completed another update to add apple's home link but still does not stay connected to the network. I have reset the bulbs and even purchased a new wireless router just for the lifx bulbs and the same problem persists. Have other smart home accessories by TP-Link that never fail to remain connected.
customer_reviews.author: Adama

customer_reviews.title: Drops connection too much!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this bulb. Was pretty easy to set it up and connect it to my smartthings, but it keeps dropping the connection. I have other bulbs that don't lose their connection, but this one is constantly dropping off the network and i have to unplug it for it to reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: LTGM

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, super bright!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a lamp for her bedside that could be red when she got up in the middle of the night, or woke up before the sun rose, so she wouldn't lose her night vision or wake me up. This lamp is a LOT brighter than I was expecting. I'm used to 60W replacement style lamps, and this feels like a 100 or 120W replacement. I have no better way to describe it, this lamp was EXTREME overkill for what I was trying to do! Regardless, the app is good, and I integrated it into my SmartThings setup which went just fine. No complaints here, though I might steal it and give my wife something less jarring!
customer_reviews.author: Pat K.

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, so-so app.
customer_reviews.text: The light bulb itself it pretty great. Setting it up was easy, and I haven't had any connectivity issues. The range of colors and brightness has been fun to play with. I replaced the bulb in my room using one of these adapters:  So far, so good. On my particular ceiling fan, the bulb was small enough to fit under the shroud even with the adapter. The app has limited functionality, and interface isn't the most intuitive (scenes vs. schedules, why can't I just setup both at once?) However, if you combine it with something like IFTTT, you can achieve some really fantastic things, like blinking your lights when the weather changes to rain.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Coates

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightbulb. The colors are very accurate and very vibrant. I have paired this lightbulb with I FTTT and it does amazing things now. I configured it to turn blue when it is raining, green when I'm on my way home using geofencing, it also has a sun up and sundown timer to automatically go on and off. One thing to mention is that its output is pretty close to a 60 W incandescent bulb. It's not bright enough to light your whole living room, but it is nice as a little side lamp and provides great novelty if you can set up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Meemster

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bulb to work with my home automation ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bulb to work with my home automation, connected to a Smartthings hub and voice controlled through Echo. I found about half the time, I would tell Echo to turn on the light and it wouldn't turn on. After playing with it for a week or so, I got frustrated and swapped it out for a GoControl Z-Wave Dimmable LED Light Bulb. It doesn't do the colors, which I miss, but it turns on every time I tell Alexa to turn on the light.
customer_reviews.author: Smackmeister

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for full color bulb
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Amazing colors. Very easy app to control and set scenes to fit your mood or needs. We have one called "Walking Dead" that is dark blood red. We use that scene when watching the show. Very cool. Another called "movie time" that is a very faint dark blue. Perfect for watching movies in the dark but still having enough light not to stub your toe when leaving to the bathroom. Excellent tech support too. Integrated with our Amazon Alexa perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JCD_Cali

customer_reviews.title: Great way to save money!
customer_reviews.text: If you want all the excitement of a color changing light bulb with the magic of your cell phone and don't want to spend a fortune or have your entire house linked together, this is the bulb for you! The options are plentiful and it looks gorgeous, especially the ones that change gradually. You have a lot of control over how dramatic the changes are and how fast it changes as well as shades and hues. I got this as a gift for my parents and it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Zaconie

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: It is good when it works, but after it starts to lose connectivity, it turns into an expensive LED bulb, nothing more. I had three, and just after the warranty expired, all three have lost connection and cannot get back on the network, no matter what I try. And when it miraculously happens, it is very inconsistent
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Blows the Philips Hue our of the water!
customer_reviews.text: Blows the Philips Hue our of the water! *MUCH* better greens with this (actual green, not spinach) and really, really bright! Only knock is this is WiFi, not Zigbee so in my apartment with competing wifi signals, it occasionally doesn't respond, but then again, no hub! And in most houses, wifi interference isn't a problem. Either way, that's a knock on my environment, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: For the same price, just buy the current version, that's still totally supported, and almost unnoticeable brighter.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very big difference between the current version, colors may appear SLIGHTLY different, but does not get updates such as the HomeKit updates the current models got. I would suggest to just get the current version, just called LIFX (A19) i believe. Would also not suggest buying a refurb, i was sent a white only model in the color 1000 box, which was fixed by amazon, but since there were no more refurbished ones, the cost was slightly higher.
customer_reviews.author: Max W

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best thing I've bought this year
customer_reviews.text: Really love these bulbs. I couldn't be happier with them. I've never had any issues with them even though I was skeptical at first after reading some reviews. I've had them for several months and I only want to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Excellent colors and shades that I can control ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Excellent colors and shades that I can control from a Windows10pc, phone or iPAD Air. I have 4 now. There are times when initial configuration can be a repetitive pain, and documentation / support could be better, but all-in-all they do what they're supposed to do. I would suggest that they make their software control interface a little more the same between different platforms. Windows 10 LIFX needs an update.
customer_reviews.author: davequ

customer_reviews.title: The updated model is a downgrade
customer_reviews.text: Sure it does cool stuff, but it has the worst connectivity problems. Most days I have to reset it at the light switch, which is frustrating seeing as how much I paid for this for the automation aspect. So schedules, alarms and geofencing is worthless with this because it's so unreliable. I've been emailing the manufacturer repeatedly. They always have some kind of a fix, even a new firmware for me, but the issue remains. I have a couple of the originals lights and they work great. I wish they just kept making those.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding prouct
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Colors are very nice. I though it was a little overpriced but I found it cheaper in their website. Revision 3/25/18: I have had an extremely difficult time with the LIFT bulbs in a new network. I contacted LIFX and they were helpful. They directed me on how to update the bulbs firmware, however, even this has proven difficult to do. NOW I have 4-5 very, very expensive traditional white bulbs (Yes, they can't connect to the network.)
customer_reviews.author: From the Oil Patch

customer_reviews.title: The product and software have both improved dramatically since launch—and both were good to begin with
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. I was a kickstarter backer for LIFX back in the very beginning. The product and software have both improved dramatically since launch—and both were good to begin with! LIFX's customer service and communication with end-users is also excellent. I had a warranty replacement issue with one bulb back in the early days, and it was replaced VERY quickly. To date, I own nearly 20 LIFX bulbs and have never had another problem with them. Once set up, they just work. They also integrate well with many other apps like Nest and IFTTT. I have mine set up to fade in in the morning, fade out at night, and turn on/off when I enter/leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, performance dependent on app
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad that I came across Lifx, these bulbs have been great and beautiful. I've used them to adjust my circadian rhythms; they can also be used for Seasonal Affective Disorder. Note that performance is largely dependent on the app you use to control them; I recommend checking out the app you plan to use (Lifx or otherwise) before purchasing. The light will turn on and off with a lightswitch, but if you are using a timer/color change for your bulbs, the setting will not change if the lightswitch is in the off position.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work
customer_reviews.text: When these bulbs work, they are fantastic. But at least half the bulbs I bought show offline half the time and aren't usable from the app. I have to constantly power cycle lamps to get back online. I contacted support and they replied quickly and advised I reset the bulbs. That seems to help for a while, but then they go right back to dropping offline. For the price, I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from Wi-Fi when color is changed.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I set a color or theme it disconnects from Wi-Fi. Even with the latest firmware. Emailed support several times and never received a response. I purchased this first bulb to test and evaluate and I am disappointed as I heard great things. I guess I will have to keep searching. If you find this review helpful, please click yes for helpful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Clark

customer_reviews.title: I have had the bulbs for 5 months now and basically am using them as a basic bulb now such a waste of cash
customer_reviews.text: Im in the same boat here, I have had the bulbs for 5 months now and basically am using them as a basic bulb now such a waste of cash! I have tried numerous things and all the support answers dont seem to do anything, the bulbs constantly go on and offline. Just tonight I have my niece over and she wanted me to show her the cool colors and guess what.... bulbs mostly stayed offline and bounced in and out, such a waste! Im so disappointed with this whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Better and brighter than I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: This light bulb is even better than I had imagined. It is *really* bright and the colors come through vividly. I had a bit of a hard time getting it set up which wasn't its fault, it was my network's fault. My wireless router was set up with WEP security and I couldn't get the LIFX to connect at all. I switched to WPA2 (it should have been that way anyway) and it connected right up. I will be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L

customer_reviews.title: Not loving this as much as the Hue so far.
customer_reviews.text: Not loving this as much as the Hue so far. It doesn't require a hub, but I notice if I set it to alternate colors or any other effect, that only works while the iPhone app is active whereas the Hue is run by the hub. Otherwise it is OK and the colors are more saturated than the Hue. The brightness is good too. For me, I prefer the Hue system. For others, this might be perfect and maybe there are ways to get more out of it that I need to look into.
customer_reviews.author: S. Powell

customer_reviews.title: It's fun and cool when it works
customer_reviews.text: This light bulb has been more of a pain than anything else. I've had to reset it numerous times, and going through the reset has often been difficult itself. It's fun and cool when it works, but it's very annoying when it doesn't work, which seems to be the norm rather than the exception. I don't recommend this product; it's not worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Color beats Hue; But software, networking, and integrations could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Google Home yet, but it is compatible with Amazon Echo. Has a better color range than the Philips Hue. App only works when the internet connection is up; unable to make adjustments using only the local network. Sometimes the bulb randomly disconnects from the network even when the local WIFI is working fine. When this happens you either need to wait a while or cycle the power to get it to reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: R3AD3R

customer_reviews.title: Best lights for the price..
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit iffy on getting the Lifx brand. These lights are the greatest when it comes to setting the mod and they're pretty bright at 100%. I like the timer mode which help me sleep and wake up. I had them for a few months and there still working 100%. The best thing about these lights is that they connect straight to the wifi connection and you dont need any smart third party controller for the lights..
customer_reviews.author: dLabs

customer_reviews.title: The Right Lights for Your Smart Home Life!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so awesome. I love the fact that this light has no need for a hub and can be accessed from your phone at home or away from home. The colors are brilliant and the themes and effects are plentiful. I can't wait until I receive my Google Home so I can hook these bad boys up and control them by voice. Watch the video review from our YouTube channel -Smart Home Tech- to get a more in depth perspective on these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Home TechTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Awesome transformed my room from lame to mood disorder
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with these lifx bulbs. They are more than just lighting. These change color and can really set a relaxing mood or a studying mood for brighter study room or what ever your studying light setting you want them to be. They can be set to wake with you or wake you up and bunch of other settings. these are amazing I'm super happy I got them. I recommend at least two of these. Only pros no cons for me.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: You have to get these
customer_reviews.text: The white flight options on these lightbulbs is amazing. Setting the bulbs to different intensity or different Calvin levels is extremely easy in the bulbs are extremely accurate. Setting to different colors is really fun and the intensity of the colors is astounding. I have the bulbs are attached to my Amazon echo So all we have to do is say Alexa turn on... It's pretty amazing. I just submitted a second order for an additional bulb because things are working so well with the original three.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Rocking the colors - and with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine and I had to get it setup. I did the update, claimed it or connected it to the cloud, Linked LIFX in the Alexa app, then enabled the skill in Alexa. I now have total control from my phone, my Echo and my DOT. I can easily tell it to turn on or off. It's a little more to change brightness by a % or change the color but it is so cool just to say it and it happens without getting up and finding my phone. The family thought the echo alone was cool, this year they get to witness all the light and garage door control.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Best smart home gadget yet. Works great w/ Echo
customer_reviews.text: 5 LIFX Color 1000 in the house now, 3 A19 & 2 BR30 and am pleased with all. Would have more but ran out of appropriate fixtures. Wish there were plug or socket adapters or wall switches for lamps & fixtures that don't use their type of bulbs. The command system works great with my Amazon Echo & Dot set-up. And NO additional hubs needed.
customer_reviews.author: jdps

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Installed it on the network just fine, then it drops randomly. Customer support wanted to blame me, my network, how many devices I have attached but never admitting this is a known and ongoing problem. It is documented here and on twitter. Sadly, if the could fix connectivity this would be a nice bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nice app to control them
customer_reviews.text: Loving these bulbs, this is the second batch I purchased, the only missing feature is the integration with Siri, but I have emailed them and they told me the integration is on the works, so maybe for iOS 11 we will have fully integration with Apple HomeKit to make this even better. Great intensity of the lights, fully recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This light is a lot of fun to use. It is also practical. By setting up some IFTTT recipes you can use it to notify you of many things. When you baseball team scores, when you get a text...missed call, when your Alexa timer goes off, etc. The software and api's could be a little better, that why I only gave four stars. The nice thing is that this works over wifi and doesn't require an additional hub. I'll most likely be getting a few more of these in the future for other rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Transformed our home
customer_reviews.text: These are the best color bulbs on the market - truest colors, brightest across the color spectrum, fully dimmable. They have transformed our home. Adjusting the color temperature and brightness of the bulbs is amazing in itself, but being able to change the color of our entire apartment to any shade and brightness to match the mood is revolutionary. The music following mode is great for parties. Couldn't be happier with these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: laddiebuck

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Bulb Available Today!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs change the way my house feels. I absolutely love them. Welcome to the future folks! The colors are awesome and help preserve my night vision at night. They set the right mood when I need it and the colors are nice for producing low light when a movie is on without being distracting. The ability to switch to white is great too when you need to really light up the room. Not having a hub to buy is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: I do work stuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright white light plus every other color you might what
customer_reviews.text: . I do think the price is high but these bulbs do work on there own without a hub and I am thinking the price will come down with time, If they last then the price will not be as big of a concern but for now its wait and see. I have order couple of the white 800 for couple of more single spot and will use a switch for lights that use more than one bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bock

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright, Easy to set up, Will get more!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are easy to set up on their own, easy to pair with a Smartthings hub. The amount of color control they provide is amazing, many many colors (highly accurate) and even many types of white light so it is easy to choose your preferred lighting. They are VERY bright, so I typically leave them at 70% brightness, which is nice. Excellent product, cheaper than Hue, no hub required. I even purchased a second bulb direct from LIFX. Despite some customer service issues, Ill be sure to get more of these. For Halloween I was even able to use a "Spooky" mode to creep out local trick or treaters.
customer_reviews.author: Max Fidler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for $60!! Bright and Colourful
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much that I ordered 2 more. The app is insane. If you want to buy more than one than buy it off their website. You can apply some discount codes. :) But hats off to Amazon for a fast shipment!
customer_reviews.author: Abul  Imam

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, looks great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent connections via wifi even in same room with router. Great idea, looks great when it works.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working altogether
customer_reviews.text: Failed to work after two months; even after trying every troubleshooting process and emailing support.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color choices but if you lose power they are a pain to get reset to the app. Update to review worked fine for two years now they won’t connect. I now have two useless bulbs tried to get LIFX support but no luck as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Maynes

customer_reviews.title: The lightbulb was great..
customer_reviews.text: The lightbulb was great... when it worked. It lost connection to my wifi and therefore it's phone app and my Echo way too often. I replaced it once and it still had the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Only one choice for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought smart lights from 5 different manufacturers. LIFX beats them all hands down. This is one of those products you feel proud to own. They are brighter, produce MUCH better colors and are easy to use/install. A 3rd party software called "Lightbow" makes this an unbelievable experience. I recommend LIFX to anyone looking for Smart Lights. I have four of these and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Repro63

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products I have been using the bulbs for over ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products I have been using the bulbs for over a year I love the variety of colors they offer I have them set up for my favorite team colors every time they score smart thing flashes my lights with my team colors go Jaguars
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Brighter and better colors than the Hue bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Brighter and better colors than the Hue bulbs. Also larger (A-19) and heavier. Unfortunately the rest of my house is lit by various types of Hue bulbs, so I use the various apps written for Hue bulbs (fireworks, Xmas, Halloween, Hue Pro) for cool lighting presets. Won't work, obviously, for these bulbs. They can be controlled by my Echo.
customer_reviews.author: KirkinSanMarcos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart bulb, priced a bit high but good functionality and features
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smart bulb, certainly better than first gen A19 (this is the Color 1000) and more reliable to boot. Price is high which is the only downside as you can find similar function for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: EricTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Colored Fun
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. You just have to hook up one bulb at a time. They connect to your home internet and then you can control them via the app on your phone. If you leave your phone you have to cut the lights off then on and then they will cut on. Until you have easily changeable colored bulbs you dont realize how much you will play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of the set up and now I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of the set up and now I can turn my light on and off whether I'm home or away using my phone. I turned the lights green on st. Patrick's day while away from home and came come to a green lit house.
customer_reviews.author: Moto Guzzi

customer_reviews.title: I love it and all
customer_reviews.text: I love it and all, but the updates are lacking; and so are the features provided by the platform. Think if you really need it, or have a smart home setup otherwise you'll end up turning it on and off. (Like a typical light bulb...)
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Client

customer_reviews.title: Good fit with Amazon Echo
customer_reviews.text: Paired with Amazon Echo using IFTTT apps, the family loves it. I had a little trouble pairing to the Echo when using the smart phone, but worked the first time when I switched to the desktop computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jer2911

customer_reviews.title: specially when Phillips options are better for the same price
customer_reviews.text: Setup is a pain in the ass and after setup... most of the times it won't appear on the LIFX app on Android (even after several firmware update). Wont' buy again from this brand, specially when Phillips options are better for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: it's quite a good light. I'm not sure it's rated for outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: It occasionally doesn't do the thing it's scheduled to do, but aside from that, it's quite a good light. I'm not sure it's rated for outdoor use, but I'm using it in an outdoor light fixture and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bulb
customer_reviews.text: I love this bulb!! It does not require a hub and it worked as it was suppose to. Now that I have a hub and the Phillips Hue bulbs I see the difference but this bulb worked when I couldn't afford to buy the hub. I still use it, I just have to use a different app then the other.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit729

customer_reviews.title: Love this bulb
customer_reviews.text: Love this bulb. I haven't had any problems with drops and I use the worst WiFi ever. This light is exactly what I was hoping it would be and connecting it to my Echo has made my mornings and nights much more pleasant now that I can stay in bed and control the lighting while I'm waking up/falling asleep. So glad I went against my gut and spent the $60 on this bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Works well for an automatic day-light -> nightlite
customer_reviews.text: My application for this bulb is simple: Daily cycle for a lamp on 24/7, shifting between daylight use, evening use, and a deep red nightlight use. For this purpose it is perfect and has required no maintenance or fiddling since it was set up about 6 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: cmajor9th

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Constantly had connection difficulties. Ended up getting a Phillips hue.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love Lifx bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I love Lifx bulbs. They've ironed out the app problems they had early on and now they work great. I love being able to change the color and brightness when I need it, as well as setting specific scenes for evening/night/movie watching/etc. Great smart bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay connected to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I’ve have this bulb since December, after about 3 months it started having issues staying connected with my internet, in contacted support and it worked for a while and went back to having issues. So now I use it like a regular bulb, only difference is it’s a $45 whitebbulb,😒
customer_reviews.author: Trini-country gal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Amazing build
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Amazing build. The app on Android is a little broken and the bulbs will "freeze" from time to time where I can't turn them off or do anything else but not sure if its my network or the bulbs. Other than that its an incredible product. Would buy more if they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan The Great

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs! They are very pricey but work great, Occasionally they will turn on on their own after a power surge or power flicker. The colors are amazing and the themes are even better. If you purchase multiple bulbs you can create some amazing themes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very buggy.  Buy a bluetooth bulb instead.
customer_reviews.text: This has serious issues with the software. It frequently stops responding with the phone, so you are stuck leaving this on whatever color you last selected. The bluetooth bulbs are much more reliable than the wifi bulbs (at least more reliable than this LIFX bulb).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifx Bulb
customer_reviews.text: I did a review of this bulb under Lifx app by mistake.The app works great with the bulb.The bulb was easy to connect.It is always ready to connect since it is wifi and not bluetooth.No problems so far.Easy to change colours with app.Connects even if you switch off and puts light on another day.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor B

customer_reviews.title: Easy Home Automation Integration
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get up and running in minutes. Integrates into my smartthings network as well as Amazon Echo rather painlessly. Works as expected. I have noted two difficulties with the product. 1) I have not yet figured out how to effectively have Amazon change the color of the bulb. 2) Effects like "Music Visualizer," and "Color Cycle" only work when the application is open. Other than that I am rather impressed with ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, switching to Philips
customer_reviews.text: I found the customer support from LIFX to be un-supportive. Could not connect to the light bulb over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: neat
customer_reviews.text: it did take some time and youtube but its up and running now on some resipes there are some time delays but nothing too searious ill buy just the regualr bulbs for my next purcase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: We have a floor lamp you could touch to turn on/off with 3 brightness levels that broke after a few years. We decided to try a smart bulb to restore the adjust-ability and went with LIFX based on recommendations from a few friends (better colors and no hub required). I had a hard time justifying $45.00 for a light bulb but am so happy we did! The colors are fun, the app is very easy to use, and adjusting the brightness is perfect expecially in the morning. I'm considering giving a few as Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: AV wine

customer_reviews.title: Great deal when on sale!
customer_reviews.text: I bought five of these lights on sale. Once installed they perform flawlessly. The color range, connectivity, Alexa integration and remote access makes it a great buy. I will buy them again when the are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Wayburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bulb
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING bulb and Id go so far as to say this is the best smart bulb out there and the most convenient. Lifx customer service is spot on, helpful, fast, knowledgeable and overall a joy to work with should you run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Aesir

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent design and color light bulb
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent design and color light bulb. I wish one day they become less expensive so you can use them around the house as they connect directly with the home WiFi network. As is now the WiFi capability probably makes the bulb quite expensive to use on multiple house lights. More various bulbs should be designed instead of just 2-3 currently. I had no problem installing it and connected.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris Pantzartzis

customer_reviews.title: Fills the room with light and having fun making all the different colors
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for a light bulb, but should last a long time. Fills the room with light and having fun making all the different colors. Fun for entertaining. Easy to set up and can control from your smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had it about a week so far with no issues. The colors are very bright. It hasn't dropped the wifi signal yet. A little pricey, but an awesome bulb.
customer_reviews.author: J AndersonTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: The best light I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best light I've ever owned. Color temperature can adjust as needed throughout the day, and the colors are vibrant. The light is more responsive than my Hue lights, and the app is easy to use. By far the best light I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Zach S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Bulb
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and connected them to alexa. They're placed in my movie theater, and it's nice to be able to control these with my voice. There are also multiple third party apps to make cool types of colors and patters that you can choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Pterodactyl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these light bulbs! App witks great! Always updating! People are in memorized when yhey see the colors changing! Definitely a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Enoch

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are VERY bright compared to many other smart LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are VERY bright compared to many other smart LED bulbs, especially RGB ones. The software to control them is very powerful, especially if you have an Android phone with Tasker. The hubless design is great if you have an WiFi access point that is capable of having all your bulbs connected to it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up and works wonderfully with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and works wonderfully with Alexa. Has a huge amount of customization from colors to different light styles. Will even dance along to music. A little spendy but overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Payne

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The app needs some work and the "ok Google" integration (can only control ALL the lights), but besides that... Definitely a great light. Fix the app and "ok Google" and will definitely get 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Nice colors fairly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Nice colors fairly easy to set up. Cons Istanbul that it sometimes lose connection and you can't control it with the app. Also it's not working with "okay google" as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone App Controlled Light Bulbs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Any color your heart desires, these lights can bring to reality. With a wide range of functions/themes; i.e. strobe, dimming, warm tones. They are quite pricey, but well worth the investment. You won't have to replace them like standard light bulbs. P.S. If you're like me and forget to turn off the lights before leaving home, you can turn them off on your way to work via the app.
customer_reviews.author: Life Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lights! One of the most exciting lighting options ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lights! One of the most exciting lighting options to have! Connected them with my Smartthings home automation and IFTTT. If you want deep blue colors these are a better option than HUE. LIFX had more blue leds in their bulbs giving a better range of colors. Fyi blue usually costs more. So I am assuming LIFX has a greater investment in the led part of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pellizze

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting and well-designed app
customer_reviews.text: Good lighting and well-designed app. Kept dropping off my network causing Amazon Echo to be unable to control it. Returned and replaced with Phillips Hue smart bulb.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Lights.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I had with this is one light out of four has problems syncing in the bedroom had to recynce it 4 times for it to work. Also the app is sluggish loads slow ect.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed these bulbs when they worked
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed these bulbs when they worked. Now they don’t work. Will not connect to my network. Tired of having to reconnect again and again. Now useless. Save your money. Buy a smart plug. Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: K Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I love this item and it creates beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this item and it creates beautiful colors. Minus one star because of the cost but if you can afford it I recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Stanos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, rich color reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Simple, seemless configuration with Amazon echo. Beautiful, rich color reproduction. Color temperature of white light variations are impressive. Smooth, controllable transitions between colors. Effects are a treat. Kids enjoyed the random color effect over the holidays. Expensive but highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: great color smart bulb
customer_reviews.text: Best color smart bulbs on the market. I'm using them with SmartThings and they work great. Awesome colors and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good colors; relatively easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: If your network signal strength has its moments, the lights will sometimes be unresponsive. But usually, they follow the schedules you make without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Always love my lifx
customer_reviews.text: Always love my lifx. Even after power outages if I give it time to fix itself, it's been working wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Analeah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these bulbs that are hooked up to our Amazon Echo...
customer_reviews.author: Dennwins

customer_reviews.title: Ready for a light show
customer_reviews.text: Little trouble connecting to my WIFI, I had 5.4 and 2 GHz with same name, which caused a conflict. And some security setting made it hard to setup. Bought cheap router and it worked in 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the Misfit Bolt. It rarely disconnects from the Wifi connection. I only wish that there was a "normal" white color to select, when using it for everyday purposes.
customer_reviews.author: FreshAsVeggies

customer_reviews.title: Weak. Do better LIFX. Do better.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely if ever write reviews on Amazon. If I write one, the product must be pretty bad. To qualify, I am 34 and grew up with technology. I'm damn good at troubleshooting and getting things to work. This device is absolutely not worth the effort. With Philips' Hue on the market, I'm surprised LIFX believes this obtuse nonsense is marketable. Over an hour of fighting with minutiae of detail, and it still is barely working with Amazon Echo. Phhbbbtttt!!!! (Returned)
customer_reviews.author: Justin T Brigham

product_meta.title: LIFX Smart LED Light Bulb, Wi-Fi, Color 1000 A19, Multicolor, Dimmable, Works with Amazon Alexa
product_meta.description:
LIFX color 1000 A19 Wi-Fi smart LED light bulb Multicolor, dimmable, no hub required. With LIFX, how your bulb connects to Wi-Fi is important, so all our technology is built right into each individual bulb - no hub required. Works with Nest.

Note : Please update the app periodically to push new features and bug fixes to improve performance.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
Easy to set up, Built-in Wi-Fi no hub
Adjustable up to 16 million colors and 1000 shades of whites
App and cloud controls, Works with Nest and SmartThings

specifications.Special Features: Smart Led Bulb, No Hub Required, Dimmable, Multi Colored
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars540 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
